buscript

Interface StringReplacer


  • public interface StringReplacer
    Represents a regex string, usually something simple like "%t" to be replaced by another string.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getGlobalVarName()
      If this does not return null, Buscript will create a global variable in the scripting environment with this as a name and getReplacement() as a value.
      String getRegexString()
      A regex string representing what should be replaced.
      String getReplacement()
      The string to replace with.

    • Method Detail

      • getRegexString

        String getRegexString()
        A regex string representing what should be replaced.
        Returns:
        a regex string representing what should be replaced.

      • getReplacement

        String getReplacement()
        The string to replace with. This should probably return null after a script has been run.
        Returns:
        the string to replace with.

      • getGlobalVarName

        String getGlobalVarName()
        If this does not return null, Buscript will create a global variable in the scripting environment with this as a name and getReplacement() as a value.
        Returns:
        the name for a global script variable or null to not use this feature.
